languages.text: "Ты продырявила славную женщину, что спасла тебя, увидев странную штуковину в ее руках. А я по призванию держу при себе странные штуковины. Давай в следующий раз ты немного поразмыслишь, прежде чем палить?"

"You caught your rescuer holding a strange contraption and you put a hole through her. In my line of work, keeping strange devices on my person is unavoidable — how about next time you think before you shoot?"
languages.original_text: "Ты продырявила славную женщину, что спасла тебя, увидев странную штуковину в ее руках. А я по призванию держу при себе странные штуковины. Давай в следующий раз ты немного поразмыслишь, прежде чем палить?"

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你发现了救你一命的人手里拿着某个古怪的装置，于是你就在她脑袋上开了个洞。在我这行，随身携带古怪的装置恐怕是无法避免的事情。所以，等你下次开枪之前，可不可以先好好想想？”
languages.original_text: "You caught your rescuer holding a strange contraption and you put a hole through her. In my line of work, keeping strange devices on my person is unavoidable — how about next time you think before you shoot?"

traits.locale_text: “你发现了救你一命的人手里拿着某个古怪的装置，于是你就在她脑袋上开了个洞。在我这行，随身携带古怪的装置恐怕是无法避免的事情。所以，等你下次开枪之前，可不可以先好好想想？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez surpris votre sauveuse avec un appareil étrange et vous l'avez immédiatement transformée en passoire. Vu que je suis obligée de conserver sur ma personne un certain nombre d'appareils que l'on pourrait qualifier d'étranges, la prochaine fois, vous voudrez bien prendre le temps de réfléchir deux secondes avant de tirer ? »
languages.original_text: "You caught your rescuer holding a strange contraption and you put a hole through her. In my line of work, keeping strange devices on my person is unavoidable — how about next time you think before you shoot?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez surpris votre sauveuse avec un appareil étrange et vous l'avez immédiatement transformée en passoire. Vu que je suis obligée de conserver sur ma personne un certain nombre d'appareils que l'on pourrait qualifier d'étranges, la prochaine fois, vous voudrez bien prendre le temps de réfléchir deux secondes avant de tirer ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Vio a su rescatadora con un artefacto extraño y decidió pegarle un tiro. En mi trabajo, es imprescindible tener trastos extraños encima. ¿Podría pensárselo antes de disparar?».
languages.original_text: "You caught your rescuer holding a strange contraption and you put a hole through her. In my line of work, keeping strange devices on my person is unavoidable — how about next time you think before you shoot?"

traits.locale_text: «Vio a su rescatadora con un artefacto extraño y decidió pegarle un tiro. En mi trabajo, es imprescindible tener trastos extraños encima. ¿Podría pensárselo antes de disparar?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「アンタは妙な機械を持ってる救助人を捕まえて撃ち殺した。アタシのような仕事をしてると、妙な装置を身につけてるなんて当たり前じゃないか…次は撃つ前に考えたらどう？」
languages.original_text: "You caught your rescuer holding a strange contraption and you put a hole through her. In my line of work, keeping strange devices on my person is unavoidable — how about next time you think before you shoot?"

traits.locale_text: 「アンタは妙な機械を持ってる救助人を捕まえて撃ち殺した。アタシのような仕事をしてると、妙な装置を身につけてるなんて当たり前じゃないか…次は撃つ前に考えたらどう？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt Eure Retterin mit einem merkwürdigen Gerät in der Hand entdeckt und sie durchlöchert. In meiner Branche ist es unvermeidlich, merkwürdige Geräte bei sich zu haben. Vielleicht denkt Ihr nächstes Mal erst nach, bevor Ihr schießt?"
languages.original_text: "You caught your rescuer holding a strange contraption and you put a hole through her. In my line of work, keeping strange devices on my person is unavoidable — how about next time you think before you shoot?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Eure Retterin mit einem merkwürdigen Gerät in der Hand entdeckt und sie durchlöchert. In meiner Branche ist es unvermeidlich, merkwürdige Geräte bei sich zu haben. Vielleicht denkt Ihr nächstes Mal erst nach, bevor Ihr schießt?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "You caught your rescuer holding a strange contraption and you put a hole through her. In my line of work, keeping strange devices on my person is unavoidable — how about next time you think before you shoot?"

languages.text: "Kurtarıcının elinde tuhaf bir tertibat görünce onu delik deşik etmeden edemedin. Benim mesleğimde insanların tuhaf cihazlar taşıması önlenemez bir gerçektir. Bir dahakine ateş etmeden önce düşünsen nasıl olur?"
languages.original_text: "You caught your rescuer holding a strange contraption and you put a hole through her. In my line of work, keeping strange devices on my person is unavoidable — how about next time you think before you shoot?"

traits.locale_text: "Kurtarıcının elinde tuhaf bir tertibat gördün ve onu delik deşik ettin. Benim mesleğimde insanların tuhaf cihazlar taşıması önlenemez bir gerçektir. Bir dahakine ateş etmeden önce düşünsen nasıl olur?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
